about.title: Hi, I’m Vinícius, a <0>Software Developer</0>
about.p1: I'm a software developer focused on modern web applications. I enjoy turning ideas into functional, scalable products by combining solid engineering practices with attention to user experience.
about.p2: I currently work as a software development intern, contributing to projects involving API integrations, automation, and cloud solutions. I'm passionate about performance, architecture, and well-tested code.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
experiences.description: Software development on computer vision projects and API integrations.
